Package com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Opponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomBot, SmartBot
public abstract class Player extends Object implements Opponent
Represents a player in the game
